original: Lehmann, Jörgen Erik, processor, Göteborg, f. 15/1/98 i Köpenhamn av prof., dr teol. o. fil. Edvard L. o. Karen Wiehe. G. 26-46 m. Marie-Louise de Vylder. Barn: Orla f. 27, Klas-Erik 29. — Stud:ex. i Lund 17, med. kand. 21, med. lic. 27 o. med. dr 29, allt i Lund. E. O’. aman. v. fysiol. inst. :i Lund 20 o. 26, aman. där 20-22, assist. 27-30, doc. i fysiol. i Lund 30-37, tf. prof. i med. o. fysiol. kemi där två mån. 31 o. i fysiol. fyra mån. 31-32, prof. i biokemi v. Aarhus univ. 37-38. E. läk. v. Växjö hosp. 23-24, tf. aman. v. med. klin. i Lund sju mån. 25-27, tf. und :läk. där två mån. 26-27, därjämte kort. föroTdn. som tf. prov :läk., tf. stadsläk. o. tf. sjukstuguläk. på olika platser 28-37, förest, f. centr:lab. v. Sahlgr. sjukh. sed. 38. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. O’. Engl. Rockefellerstip. i USA 35-37. Skr.: Oxidationsenz. (ett 15-tal arb. 22-35), Neurofysiol. arb. (35-37), Beri-beri o. B 1-vitaminanalyser (40-41), Leverdiagno;stik (41), Behandl. av nyfödda m. K-vitamin samt blod-koagulationsstudier (42-44), Nytt medel (dikumarin) mot blodpropp (42-43), Analysmetoder f. kontroll av vätskebalans (44), Nytt medel mot tuberkulos (PAS) samt studier över tuber-kelbacillens ämnesomsättning (46).
translated: Lehmann, Jörgen Erik, professor, Gothenburg, b. 15/1/98 in Copenhagen to professor, doctor of theology and philosophy Edvard L. and Karen Wiehe. M. 26-46 with Marie-Louise de Vylder. Children: Orla b. 27, Klas-Erik b. 29. — Examined from Lund 17, medical candidate 21, medical licentiate 27 and medical doctor 29, all in Lund. E.O'(Extra ordinarie) assistant at the physiology institute in Lund 20 and 26, assistant there 20-22, assistant 27-30, docent in physiology at Lund 30-37, acting professor in medicine and physiological chemistry there for two months in 31 and in physiology for four months in 31-32, professor in biochemistry at Aarhus University 37-38. E. doctor at Växjö hospital 23-24, acting assistant at the medical clinic in Lund for seven months in 25-27, acting junior doctor there for two months in 26-27, also temporarily served as acting examiner, acting city doctor and acting hospital doctor in various locations 28-37, head of the central laboratory at Sahlgr. hospital since 38. Study trips to Germany and England. Rockefeller fellow in the USA from 35-37. Publications: Oxidation enzymes (about 15 works from 22-35), Neurophysiological works (35-37), Beriberi and B1 vitamin analysis (40-41), Liver diagnostics (41), Treatment of newborns with K vitamin and blood coagulation studies (42-44), New drug (dicumarin) against blood clots (42-43), Analysis methods for fluid balance control (44), New drug against tuberculosis (PAS) and studies on the metabolism of the tuberculosis bacillus (46).
